name: Got Away With It!
description:
This game was made during UE4 Summer Jam 2018.

The theme of the jam was Well that escalated quickly! In this game the thing that escalates is your debt and fine to city and amount of fun (pun )

You play as guy who has pissed off everyone in his city.

So now police and military people are trying to catch you.

Keep running and keep pissing off people to increase bounty on your head!

ENJOY!!!
